name: Jigsaw Puzzle Delicious Foods
description:
Welcome to the world of Delicious Puzzles, the puzzle game that will challenge your puzzle-solving skills while making your mouth water with images of delicious dishes from around the world. With over 50 beautiful images and 5 difficulty levels (64, 144, 289, 484, and 784 pieces), this game is a visual feast for foodies and puzzle enthusiasts alike.





55 different puzzles.

Automatically saved parts so you never lose your progress.

5 levels of difficulty (64, 144, 289, 484 and 784 pieces).

Too many background colors to change.

Zoom and move the scene, highlight border pieces, mix the remaining pieces, preview the scene.

Relaxing music and atmosphere.

Minimalist.
